thread.title: This is ~the~ video you need to watch if you’re so done with winter
thread.title_full: This is ~the~ video you need to watch if you’re so done with winter

author: Angelica Florio
title: This is ~the~ video you need to watch if you’re so done with winter
text:
This is ~the~ video you need to watch if you’re so done with winter No, it’s not a tropical beach to watch longingly, in fact it’s the opposite. Earlier this month, Portland, Oregon had record-breaking snowfall and the animals of the Oregon Zoo released a video of the animals playing in the cold fluffy winter stuff (which is what animals refer to snow as in their language, DUH). If the cold weather is bringing you down, you’re not alone. Seasonal Affective Disorder is more common than you might expect, and it’s totally normal to have the winter blues once the holidays are over. Luckily, cute videos of animals exist to remind the world that winter can make it better!
For example, this adorable polar bear is LOVING the snow. Oregon Zoo/YouTube This snow-dusted sea otter couldn’t be happier to chomp on a shrimp. Oregon Zoo/YouTube Have you ever seen such a content seal? Oregon Zoo/YouTube 
The winter fun is just beginning for these water dogs. Oregon Zoo/YouTube “Winter is amazing what are you talking about?” Oregon Zoo/YouTube And yes, there is even a baby elephant to remind you that snow is magic. Oregon Zoo/YouTube D’awwww. So much snow fun! Watch the whole video for yourself and rejoice in the winter wonderland that the Oregon Zoo became.
The Oregon Zoo’s YouTube page has tons of cute videos of their happy creatures , and it’s worth watching to lift your spirits when cold gloomy days are bringing you down.
